mapper.select: SELECT ORDR_NO, RSC_CODE, RSC_CNT, RSC_TOTAL, ORDE_DATE, IST_REQ_DATE FROM RESOURCE_ORDER WHERE RSC_ST = '발주'

SELECT C.CODE AS RSC_CODE, C.CODE_NAME AS RSC_NAME, FN_GET_RSC_PRC(C.CODE) AS RSC_PRC, FN_GET_RSC_UNIT(C.CODE) AS RSC_UNIT, FN_GET_CODE_NAME(R.SUPLCOM_CODE) AS SUC_NAME, SUM(Q.RSC_CNT) AS RSC_CNT FROM COMMON_CODE C LEFT JOIN RESOURCES R ON C.CODE = R.RSC_CODE LEFT JOIN R_QNT Q ON R.RSC_CODE = Q.RSC_CODE WHERE CODE LIKE '%' || 'RSC' || '%' GROUP BY C.CODE,C.CODE_NAME,FN_GET_RSC_PRC(C.CODE),FN_GET_RSC_UNIT(C.CODE),FN_GET_CODE_NAME(R.SUPLCOM_CODE) ORDER BY C.CODE
SELECT CODE AS SUC_CODE, CODE_NAME AS SUC_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE LIKE '%' || 'm_' || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESOURCE_ORDER( ORDR_NO, RSC_CODE, RSC_CNT, RSC_TOTAL, ORDE_DATE, IST_REQ_DATE) VALUES( F_CODE_MAKER('PO'), #{rscCode}, #{rscCnt}, #{rscTotal}, SYSDATE, #{istReqDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE RESOURCE_ORDER SET RSC_CODE= #{rscCode}, RSC_CNT = #{rscCnt}, RSC_TOTAL =#{rscTotal}, ORDE_DATE = SYSDATE, IST_REQ_DATE = #{ordeDate} WHERE ORDR_NO = #{ordrNo}
